text: Joan Anna Dalziel Seccombe, Baroness Seccombe, DBE (born 3 May 1930, n√©e Owen) is a British Conservative Party politician. She was created a Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire (DBE) in the 1984 Birthday Honours.Reference to Seccombe in The Independent From 1997 to 2001 she was Opposition Whip. Since 2006 she is the Opposition Spokesperson for Constitutional and Legal Affairs/Justice. ==References== ==Other websites== * "The Papers of Enoch Powell" * Extract from Hansard Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Conservative Life Peers
title: Joan Seccombe, Baroness Seccombe
